titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, relating to the sale of alcoholic beverages to persons who are less than 21 years of age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/20/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to withhold specified percentages of Federal aid highway funds apportioned to States that permit the sale of alcoholic beverages to persons who are less than 21 years old. (Current law applies similar withholding sanctions to States that permit the purchase or public possession of such beverages by persons under 21.)
